The height for it to be hanged depends on the little users, so take notice! The days can be shown in black and turned to the opposite side to red, to indicate “today”. This calendar has six rows, so it has space to include your own special projects and encourage children to create their own. For example, children can draw their faces on blank cards on the empty row. Material: The Calendar & Weather Pocket Chart is made out of polyester, which has high durability and mechanical and dust resistance.
